In today's business world all companies compete on knowledge, the knowledge and skills held by their workforce. Business knowledge and management skills provide competitive advantage for companies.
Marketing is an essential skill in a highly competitive, global business environment Graduates who can demonstrate knowledge, competence, skills and experience will always be in demand by employers.

The Department of Business, Management and Marketing offers a variety of programmes that all aim to equip students with a particular blend of these attributes so that they can be successful in a diverse range of business related careers. The employability of our graduates is a strength of which we are justifiably proud.

The single and combined honours programmes allow students to find a mix of generalist and specialist knowledge that is right for them. Postgraduate study allows further specialism. Every course provides the student with some choice of modules and opportunities to benefit from professional attachment.

The academic staff are engaged in a mixture of research, scholarship and consultancy which enriches the teaching and maintains its relevance and currency. Contact between staff and students is strong and this makes for a friendly learning environment.
Use the links below to find out more about the work of the department and to discover which course might be right for you.
Site Map | A-Z
